title: Notes from a Battered Grand: A Memoir/Fifty Years of Music, from Honky-Tonk to High Society
description: A personal memoir of a life of obscurity in the music business chronicles the author's numerous gigs in hotel lounges, roadside honky-tonks, Mafia dens, and socialite clubs over the last fifty years. National ad/promo. Tour.
author: Don Asher
